tool_description: Detects and identifies migration routes from GPS tracking data using movement patterns, seasonal timing, and geographic analysis.

species.description: Species name for migration pattern recognition

migration_distance_threshold_km.description: Minimum distance to classify as migration (>= 10)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All coordinate arrays must have equal length.
Insufficient tracking data: Need at least 10 GPS fixes for migration analysis.
Invalid migration threshold: Distance threshold must be >= 10 km.
Species not recognized: Provide a valid species name for migration analysis.
Invalid coordinates: Check latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180) ranges.
Temporal data insufficient: Need data spanning multiple weeks for migration detection.
usage: Provide GPS tracking arrays with timestamps, coordinates, and species name. Optionally set migration_distance_threshold_km and seasonal_analysis. Returns detected migration routes and timing.

migration_duration_days.description: Duration of migration period in days

primary_direction.description: Primary migration direction (N, S, E, W, NE, etc.)
